opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18411 day of February, 2000, the appeals are dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Brian T. Must, Pittsburgh, for John A. Sotomayor and Jay Automotive.
Don A. Gerred, Johnstown, for Terry L. Newbegin.
